name: Galliano Hot Shot
description: A delicious Italian shot: A mixture of hot coffee, spicy Galliano and luxurious whipped cream
directions: Pour the Galliano in a glass of suitable size (e.g. a 5 cl shot glass).

Holding a teaspoon to the surface of the galliano, slowly poor the coffee onto to back of the teaspoon, so the coffee creates a layer on top of the galliano. Make sure to move the spoon upwards with the face of the liquid.
Top with whipped cream and enjoy!
